html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-09132023-09-25FIN
ActInsurance Companies Act
SubjectInvestments in Permitted Infrastructure Entities Regulations
PrecisREGULATIONS FOR PERMITTED INFRASTRUCTURE INVESTMENTS in order to (1) define the requirements for an entity to qualify as a permitted insurance entity; (2) prescribe the infrastructure assets and permitted infrastructure entity activities; and (3) establish the terms and conditions of the new power for life and health insurance entities to acquire controlling or substantial equity investments in permitted infrastructure entities.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2023-0197 Publication Date: 2023-10-11
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Investments in Permitted Infrastructure Entities Regulations
precis: REGULATIONS FOR PERMITTED INFRASTRUCTURE INVESTMENTS in order to (1) define the requirements for an entity to qualify as a permitted insurance entity; (2) prescribe the infrastructure assets and permitted infrastructure entity activities; and (3) establish the terms and conditions of the new power for life and health insurance entities to acquire controlling or substantial equity investments in permitted infrastructure entities.
